name: DrawPen
description: DrawPen is a simple screen annotation. Available on macOS, Windows & Linux.
readme_summary: DrawPen is a cross-platform screen annotation tool that allows users to draw on their screen in real-time. It supports macOS, Windows, and Linux and offers features like pen, shapes, text, highlighter, laser pointer, and eraser. It also provides customizable keybindings for quick access to different tools.
key_features: Various annotation tools (pen, shapes, text, highlighter, laser, eraser)
primary_use_case: Real-time screen annotation for presentations, tutorials, or demonstrations.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist using a magical pen to draw directly onto a computer screen, creating vibrant annotations that float above the underlying windows. The artist is sketching a presentation outline with arrows, circles, and text, highlighting key points. The screen emits a soft glow, and digital particles swirl around the pen tip, symbolizing the software's functionality. Small UI elements showing the DrawPen toolbar are subtly visible in the corner. The scene is set in a brightly lit, modern office. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a clean, focused composition.

name: KeyTik
description: A Powerful Multi-Profile Key Mapper, Clicker, Macro, and More.
readme_summary: KeyTik is a Python-based automation tool that leverages AutoHotkey to provide key mapping, macro creation, and click automation functionalities. It allows users to create custom profiles for remapping keys, automating mouse clicks, and executing complex macros across various applications and devices.
primary_use_case: Automating repetitive tasks and customizing keyboard/mouse input for improved efficiency and accessibility.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled clockmaker meticulously adjusting the gears inside a large, intricate clock. Each gear represents a key or mouse action being remapped and automated. The clockmaker uses specialized tools to fine-tune the gears, ensuring precise timing and execution. Small screens display UI elements of KeyTik, showing keybindings and macro configurations. Digital particles flow around the clock, visualizing the automated processes. The scene is set in a brightly lit workshop with a clean, organized aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with detailed textures and vibrant colors.

name: MassGen
description: ðŸš€ MassGen: An Open-source Multi-Agent Scaling System Inspired by Grok Heavy and Gemini Deep Think. Join the discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/VVrT2rQaz5
readme_summary: MassGen is an open-source multi-agent system designed for scaling GenAI applications. It enables parallel processing, intelligence sharing, and consensus building among multiple AI agents to solve complex tasks, inspired by systems like Grok Heavy and Gemini Deep Think. The system supports features like cross-model synergy, live visualization, and adaptive coordination.
primary_use_case: Scaling GenAI applications through multi-agent collaboration.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a group of architects collaboratively designing a futuristic skyscraper, each working on different blueprints that converge into a single, unified plan. One architect sketches ideas, another analyzes structural integrity on a holographic display, and a third presents material options. Digital threads of code subtly weave through their designs, connecting them to a central AI 'brain' that optimizes the overall structure. The repository name, 'MassGen,' is subtly displayed on a blueprint. The scene is set in a brightly lit, collaborative studio with a clean, modern aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: NextTube
description: A youtube-alternative frontend made using Reactjs
readme_summary: NextTube is a ReactJS-based YouTube alternative frontend that prioritizes user privacy and an ad-free experience. It offers features like a modern UI, customizable playback controls, search functionality, playlist management, and user account creation, aiming to provide a more secure and user-friendly video-watching platform.
primary_use_case: Providing a privacy-focused, ad-free alternative to YouTube for watching online videos.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled artisan meticulously crafting a pristine, transparent glass screen representing a 'clean window' to online video content. The artisan carefully filters out dark, intrusive elements (representing ads and trackers) using specialized tools. The filtered light shines brightly onto the screen, displaying vibrant, engaging video content. Subtle UI elements float around the artisan, and the words 'NextTube' are subtly etched into the artisan's workbench. The scene is set in a bright, airy workshop with a focus on clarity and precision. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and a vibrant color scheme.

name: activepieces
description: AI Agents & MCPs & AI Workflow Automation â€¢ (~400 MCP servers for AI agents) â€¢ AI Automation / AI Agent with MCPs â€¢ AI Workflows & AI Agents â€¢ MCPs for AI Agents
readme_summary: Activepieces is an open-source, TypeScript-based platform for AI workflow automation and building AI agents. It provides a no-code interface for creating workflows and integrates with various services through customizable pieces, which can also be used as MCP (Multi-Cloud Processing) servers for AI agents. It aims to be an extensible and secure alternative to Zapier, with a focus on AI-first capabilities and community contributions.
key_features: MCP server functionality for AI agents
AI SDK for custom agent creation
Hot reloading for local piece development
primary_use_case: Automating workflows and building AI agents through a no-code interface with extensible, open-source integrations.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect overseeing a construction site where robotic arms are assembling complex structures from various building blocks, each representing a different software service (e.g., a block with a Google Sheets logo, another with an OpenAI logo). The architect uses a tablet displaying a visual workflow diagram to orchestrate the robots. Finished structures glow with a soft, digital light, showcasing automated processes. Small UI elements and code snippets float subtly around the scene. The repository name, 'Activepieces,' is subtly integrated into the architect's blueprint. The scene is set in a bright, modern workshop. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: youtu-agent
description: A simple yet powerful agent framework that delivers with open-source models
readme_summary: Youtu-Agent is a flexible, high-performance framework for building, running, and evaluating autonomous agents using open-source models. It supports tasks like data analysis, file processing, and deep research, and is optimized for accessible, low-cost deployment.
key_features: Verified performance on WebWalkerQA and GAIA benchmarks using DeepSeek-V3 series models.
Out-of-the-box support for CSV analysis, literature review, and file organization.
Flexible architecture built on openai-agents, with extensible support for diverse model APIs and tool integrations.
Automation and simplicity through YAML-based configs and auto agent generation.
primary_use_case: Building, running, and evaluating autonomous agents with open-source models for various tasks like data analysis and research.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled cartographer standing over a large, intricately detailed map, guiding tiny autonomous robots with flags representing different tasks (data analysis, research, file processing) across the terrain. The map is projected onto a holographic table, displaying real-time data streams and analysis results. Small UI elements showing agent configurations and performance metrics float around the scene. The repository name, 'Youtu-Agent,' is subtly embedded in the map's legend. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic control room. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and crisp details.

name: RLinf
description: RLinf is a flexible and scalable open-source infrastructure designed for post-training foundation models (LLMs, VLMs, VLAs) via reinforcement learning.
readme_summary: RLinf is an open-source infrastructure for post-training foundation models using reinforcement learning. It provides a flexible and scalable framework with features like macro-to-micro flow, flexible execution modes (collocated, disaggregated, hybrid), and auto-scheduling, supporting embodied agent development and integration with various VLA models and simulators.
primary_use_case: Post-training foundation models (LLMs, VLMs, VLAs) via reinforcement learning.
cover_image_prompt: A master architect overseeing a vast construction site where tiny robots are meticulously assembling a towering skyscraper. The skyscraper represents a foundation model, and the robots symbolize reinforcement learning agents. The architect holds a blueprint showing macro-level plans, while the robots execute micro-level tasks, seamlessly integrating into a unified structure. Small UI screens display training metrics and model performance. The scene is set in a bright, futuristic cityscape with glowing digital particles flowing between the architect, blueprint, and robots. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors.
